Text:
The program works great. The only thing I would add to install directions is that if it installs to the programs x86 folder you need to use the x86 .dll file, even if you are running 64bit windows. 
I tried the 64 and didn't work but the 86 worked great. 
Thanks for the share!

Help please.

I installed it and put the crack in correctly, but it asks me to enter email and product key and says it isn't activated?
Works great, only problem is there is an updated version. I did some searching around and found it. I'll find someone to post it up on here.
